trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Danbury
There were no other sightings in Danbury on or around November 17th 2001
divs: Sighting Details My mother paula entered my room to show me theobject and we went out side to veiw it, it was oval shaped and and verybright.it stayed hovering in the sky about 10 degrees to the left of oriens beltto the east it then started to slowly desend to tree top level we could stillsee the object thru the trees .we live in Danbury CT and this object appeared todesend to brookfield CT.
Summary: My mother and I had just seen a ufo in Danbury ct,
